text: segment helps you collect data from all
of your apps to understand why your
users want and what they're doing and
then helps you power those world-class
experiences
segment runs pretty much entirely on AWS
by the numbers I think we're running a
few thousand of our own ec2 instances
and then we're using ECS to actually run
at this point I think it's about fifteen
or sixteen thousand containers in
production pretty much everything is
containerized at this point what we
found is that a bunch of our customers
are trying to perform different parts of
personalization or ml but they have this
problem where they don't have the data
to power it and it turns out that if
you're running any of these pipelines
you first just need a good set of
training data before you can even get
started sort of building predictions or
recommendations and so what a lot of our
customers ended up doing is they use
segments as the place where they're
collecting all this data they're
attracting things like page views user
signing up for their service adding
items to their cart viewing different
products and then they feed those into
there's a new product called Amazon
personalized which they're then using to
create customized their product
recommendations or content
recommendations today we're processing
about 450 billion events every single
month roughly what that translates to is
a little over two hundred and fifty
thousand peak requests per second going
through our pipeline that's thousands of
ec2 instances each one is running maybe
60 to 70 docker containers which are
managed by ACS so we have about 250
different ECS services which are running
those fifteen sixteen thousand
containers and it's sort of this
beautiful synergy where they can spin up
segments really easily from day one and
just sort of get going and collecting
all their data and then they can use
that data to actually power these
recommendations without having to build
out their own machine learning pipeline
using Amazon personalized so it really
allows them to get up and running really
quickly
you
